summary: The module parses MARC XML bibliographic records, converting the XML structure into readâ€‘only field objects that expose subfields, indicators, and leader information, while providing utilities for text extraction, normalization, and cleaning of bracketed content.
business_intent: To allow the Open Library catalog system to ingest and process MARC XML data, facilitating the transformation of external library metadata into an internal format suitable for indexing, search, and display within the platform.
